head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LANDY, JOSEPH A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LANDY, JOSEPH A.

block.p: LANDY-Joseph A., formerly of Jackson Heights, Queens, on July 13, 2000. Father of Douglas Landy, Keitha Murray, Craig Landy, Pamela Arian and Morgan Landy. Calling hours at the Fred H. Mc Grath Funeral Home, Bronxville between 2-4 and 7-9 PM Friday. Mass of Christian Burial, St Joseph's Church, Bronxville on July 15th at 10 AM. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to Manhattan College, Manhattan College Sears Hall, Riverdale, NY 10471, attention Joseph Valenti.
